mapper.insert: insert into userbaseinfo ( userId, userPwd, userEmail, userSex, userName) values (#{userId},md5(#{userPwd}),#{userEmail},#{userSex},#{userName})
mapper.delete: delete from userfollow where followerId=#{userId} and followedId=#{followedId}
mapper.select: select userId,userName,userSex,userEmail from userbaseinfo where (userId=#{userId} or userName=#{userName}) and userPwd=md5(#{userPwd}) and userStatus=1
select b.userId,b.userName,b.headPortrait from userfollow f,userbaseinfo b where f.followerId = #{userId} and b.userId = f.followedId and b.userStatus=1
select b.userId,b.userName,b.headPortrait from userfollow f,userbaseinfo b where f.followedId = #{userId} and b.userId = f.followerId and b.userStatus = 1

select a.userId,a.userName,a.headPortrait,a.userStatus, COUNT(b.type = 1 or NULL) as postNum, COUNT(b.type=2 or NULL) as blogNum from articleinfo b right join userbaseinfo a on a.userId = b.userId GROUP BY a.userId

select a.userId,a.userName,a.headPortrait,a.userStatus, COUNT(b.type = 1 or NULL) as postNum, COUNT(b.type=2 or NULL) as blogNum from articleinfo b right join userbaseinfo a on a.userId = b.userId
and a.userId like concat('%',#{userId},'%')
and a.userName like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and a.userStatus = #{userStatus}
GROUP BY a.userId
